document_data.name: Corladror Silversword
document_data.mainbody: '''Corladror Silversword''' was a nobleman from [[Cormyr]]. He was one of the heads of the [[Silversword]] house during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: He was the head of House [[Silversword]].
document_data.History: He attended the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}. While there, he was among those who stood up suddenly at the sight of the [[ghost]] of the Regent [[Alusair Obarskyr]].
